description:
The course is taught through a series of lectures and cinematic scenarios to keep you engaged. The total length of the course is 50 minutes with quizzes and supplementary material for you to download and keep.

Marie the instructor is available via messaging to clarify any issues you may have

This course covers the content for the Australian Accredited Unit Provide First Aid. Those learners undertaking this course via a Registered Training Organisation (RTO) will be issued with a recognised qualification by the RTO

Other learners will gain knowledge of how to provide assistance to those suffering Heart Attacks using CPR and Defibrillation and how to provide First Aid to victims suffering from Minor and Major Injuries

Note: Undertaking this course does not qualify you as a First Aid practioner you will need further assessment by an accredited body
title: Provide First Aid
